originalText.text:
Truly awful experience. In fact, disappointing.

iPayment management,

Customer service is vital in every organization. To take the stress of your workers, hire more risk analysts so they're not as miserable or condescending as the ones I've dealt with.

My terrible experience at iPayment has caused financial damage to my business. I strongly urge the company to review the risk analyst division's protocols and help them help customers better.

.
